articles.title: Available Cheatsheets
articles.description: All suggested cheatsheets in one place
articles.contents:
You can always search at the source
My suggestions, in order of when we discussed these topics
Visualization : ggplot.
Data Group, Summarize, Join : dplyr.
Pivot and Separtate : tidyr
Factors : forcats
Dates : lubridate

articles.title: BST430 - Introduction to Statistical Computing
articles.contents:
Administrivia
MW 11:00-12:40, SRB 1402
Instructor: Tanzy Love
Website: https://bst-urmc.github.io/bst430-fall2024-site/
Syllabus
Content
Introduction
Meet the toolkit
Invites to GitHub class room are on blackboard
Req readings: r4ds 3.1-3.5, 4.
Optional readings: https://happygitwithr.com/

Resources:
install GIT
install base R
install RStudio
Lab 0 instructions and repo (accept GH classroom invite in Blackboard).

ggplot(i)
Lab 1 instructions and repo (accept GH classroom invite). Due 5pm, Sept 11.
Lab 1 solutions

dplyr(i)
Continue working on Lab 1
HW 1 assigned. instructions and repo (accept GH classroom invite). Due 5pm EDT, Sept 16.
HW 1 solutions

Data types in R.
Lab 2. You will need to accept the invitation.
Due 5pm, Sept 18.
Lab 2 solutions

Reshaping and combining data frames.
Advanced dplyr(ii)
Lab 3. To be completed in same group as lab 2, invitation here. Due 5pm, Sep 25.
Lab 3 solutions

Factors and dates
Continue working on Lab 3
HW 2 assigned. instructions and repo (accept GH classroom invite). Due 5pm EDT, Sep 30.
HW 2 solutions

Effective data visualization (i) (ii) video
Turn in lab 3.

Data from files
Repository for lecture 9 here will not be graded, but gets you everything you need at once.
Lab 4. New groups! At least one new teammate for each person.
Invitation here. Due 5pm, Oct 7.
Lab 4 solutions

styleguide
Finish lab 4.

Text processing and Regular Expressions
HW 3 assigned. instructions and repo (accept GH classroom invite). Due 5pm EDT, Oct 14.
HW 3 solutions

Text analysis
Lab 5. Pair up; you might want to take turns Pull-Committing because changing figures can cause extra GIT problems. Invitation here. Due 5pm, Oct 18.
Lab 5 solutions
Reading: r4ds chapter 14

Matrices, indexing, linear algebra
Finish Lab 5

Functions i.
Lab 6, make any groups as you like. Invitation here. Due 5pm, Oct 30.
Lab 6 solutions

Functions ii and iteration
HW 4 assigned. instructions and repo (accept GH classroom invite). Due 5pm EDT, Nov 4.
HW 4 solutions
Work on Lab 6

Knitr tricks and debugging
* Work on Lab 6
Linear models
* Work on Lab 6
Multivariate linear models

*  Work on Lab 6
Prediction and logistic regression
No class 11/6, work on your final exam.
Final Exam. Remember I will be looking at the .md for results and the .Rmd for your code. instructions and repo (accept GH classroom invite). Due 5pm EDT, Nov 7.
Ensemble models
Matt Corsetti Thesis
